page.title: 06 INTERVIEW 1
page.content:
INTERVIEW BY MRS NUTTAL OF APPLETREE STABLES.
The area consists of mostly Conservative people,although the population of the area is quite small. Mrs Nuttal has lived at Appletree Stables for about fifteen years,owning twenty-five horses and giving private riding lessons.
She states that the land is poor,but has good drainage. The main industry is farming.There are quite a few grazing fields and a few fields used for arable farming eg.wheat and orchards.
Trade is not very good and the nearest shopping-town is Cranbrook.
